currency.description: The currency for the amount value.

additionalInfo.description: The resource management error additional info.

ArmErrorAdditionalInfo.description: The resource management error additional info.

ArmErrorResponse.description: Common error response for all Azure Resource Manager APIs to return error details for failed operations. (This also follows the OData error response format.).

ArmResource.description: Common fields that are returned in the response for all Azure Resource Manager resources.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}.

resellerId.description: The MPN ID of the reseller.

billingAccountName.name: billingAccountName
billingAccountName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a billing account.

filter.name: filter
filter.description: The filter query option allows clients to filter a collection of resources that are addressed by a request URL.

orderBy.name: orderBy
orderBy.description: The orderby query option allows clients to request resources in a particular order.

top.name: top
top.description: The top query option requests the number of items in the queried collection to be included in the result. The maximum supported value for $top is 50.

skip.name: skip
skip.description: The skip query option requests the number of items in the queried collection that are to be skipped and not included in the result.

count.name: count
count.description: The count query option allows clients to request a count of the matching resources included with the resources in the response.

search.name: search
search.description: The search query option allows clients to request items within a collection matching a free-text search expression. $search is only supported for string fields.

associatedTenantName.name: associatedTenantName
associatedTenantName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a tenant.

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2023-04-01.

billingProfileName.name: billingProfileName
billingProfileName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a billing profile.

billingRequestName.name: billingRequestName
billingRequestName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a billing request.

enrollmentAccountName.name: enrollmentAccountName
enrollmentAccountName.description: The name of the enrollment account.

invoiceSectionName.name: invoiceSectionName
invoiceSectionName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies an invoice section.

customerName.name: customerName
customerName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a customer.

invoiceName.name: invoiceName
invoiceName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies an invoice.

subscriptionName.name: subscriptionName
subscriptionName.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a billing subscription.
